name: Nothing Bad Ever Happens to Me
name_original: Nothing Bad Ever Happens to Me
description:
Nothing Bad Ever Happens to me, is a short, 5 ~ 10min. story about a few girls who don't really get along.

Katrina, our heroine, is a popular girl who has had great luck in her life thus far. She's at the top of her class, her family is happy... she probably couldn't ask for a more perfect life!

One day, a few of her classmates suggest they walk home together. Might not be a bad idea to humor the lower-class.

What could go wrong?

⚠️Warnings⚠️

This game may not be suitable for minors. This game contains instances of:

-Swearing, Blood, Bullying, and Derealization/Psychosis.

Help/Walkthrough is included in the files' README note. This game was made in RPG Maker 2000 Value! version.
